sourcesContent:
<form [formGroup]="form">
    <mat-card formGroupName="basicInfo" class="form-container">
      <mat-card-title>Basic Info</mat-card-title>
  
      <!-- First name -->
      <mat-form-field>
        <mat-label>First name</mat-label>
        <input matInput placeholder="Ex. Jane" formControlName="firstName" />
      </mat-form-field>
      <!-- /First name -->
  
      <!-- Last name -->
      <mat-form-field>
        <mat-label>Last name</mat-label>
        <input matInput placeholder="Ex. Doe" formControlName="lastName" />
      </mat-form-field>
      <!-- /Last name -->
  
      <!-- email -->
      <mat-form-field>
        <mat-label>e-mail</mat-label>
        <input type="email" matInput placeholder="Ex. jane@doe.com" formControlName="email" />
      </mat-form-field>
      <!-- /email -->
  
      <!-- age -->
      <mat-form-field>
        <mat-label>Age</mat-label>
        <input type="number" matInput placeholder="Ex. 43" formControlName="age" />
      </mat-form-field>
      <!-- /age -->
    </mat-card>
  </form>
